title: Unable to connect to the pvp.net server
body:
Im seriously tired of this continuously happening..
I try to log in and it says that my connection to the pvp.net server was unable to connect? 
Now its happening when the game starts to load or now when I am in champ select... what is going on? I have tried all connection issues and nothing resolved it. I can't log on now at all. I did the hextech repair tool and that didnt find anything either.. Im at a loss. Riot you need to seriously get your shit together, If its not a patching issue its a connection issue.. You are trying to connect all of North America on to 1 server and its just not working. Quit being a cheap ass and upgrade your stuff!

replies.body:
It sounds like there's an issue with how your connection is being routed to the server. If you've worked through every step on the [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), then I recommend trying a Virtual Private Network (VPN) to reroute your connection to the servers. If you notice any change in your ability to connect, it will confirm that there are issues in your ISP route and we'll want to investigate into that.

Let me know of any updates on your issue.
